title: Learning to Stunt Drive
description:
When you see a car do a stunt in a movie or TV show, you probably think, "That's cool. I wish I had that job." We know we do. 

Mike Musto knows someone with that job: Tom McComas, Hollywood stunt man. He's been driving, falling, fighting, and crashing for decades. Today Tom's going to show Mike how to do a few basic moves in his own personal, stunt-prepped Ford Crown Victoria.
